page.title: 19EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS
page.content: extension. It is boys' school with a preparatory department and main section. {Marymount International School}was founded in 1955 in George Road, K.O.T. and is run by the Order of the Sacred Heart of Mary. The author of the Forsythe Saga, John Galsworthy, once lived in the main house, a Tudor style mansion set in 7 acres. One year there were 2l nationalities represented. {The Norwegian School}in Arterberry Road is for pupils whose parents have come from Norway to work in Britain. ADULT EDUCATION {The Midwives Training College} in Warren Cutting, K.O.T. was opened in 1950 for the 'encouragement of sound teaching in the profession of Midwif- ery at home and overseas' and owes its existence to the active support of Rt/ Hon.Aneurin Bevan,Minister of Health.
